name: Tradonia
description:
Tradonia is a short narrative text adventure set in a distant land. Play as an unknown individual and help protect a city and its surrounding forests from a deadly threat endangering the inhabitants and their way of life. 

Combat mystical foes, collect unique weapons and items, and introduce yourself to those who dwell within the forest's verdant lands.

Use a plethora of audio to guide your sensory experience through Tradonia's handcrafted story. Make decisions with care as multiple game endings give weight to all player choices. 

All art, writing, and programming done by me (Ian Percy).

All audio collected from creative commons and open source sites including:

YouTube Audio Library

https://www.zapsplat.com/

https://freesound.org/

EXEPixelPerfect font:
